items.title: Jane Goodall's friend remembers the animal advocate: "She is an inspiration for all of us"
items.standfirst: Jane Goodall, renowned chimpanzee researcher and animal welfare advocate, has died at 91. Jeffrey Flocken, chief international officer of Humane World for Animals and a personal friend of Goodall's, joins "The Daily Report" to remember her.
items.content: Jane Goodall, renowned chimpanzee researcher and animal welfare advocate, has died at 91. Jeffrey Flocken, chief international officer of Humane World for Animals and a personal friend of Goodall's, joins "The Daily Report" to remember her.

items.title: Conservationist Dame Jane Goodall dies aged 91
items.standfirst: Dr Goodall was a world-leading expert on chimpanzees and a renowned conservationist.
items.content: Dr Goodall was a world-leading expert on chimpanzees and a renowned conservationist.

items.title: Celebrated primatologist and conservationist Jane Goodall dies at 91
items.standfirst: Jane Goodall Institute France President Pierre Quintard pays tribute to the work and legacy of the legendary primatologist. Jane Goodall transformed the study of chimpanzees and became one of the world's most revered wildlife advocates. In a final video posted before her death, Goodall told an audience: "Some of us could say 'Bonjour,' some of us could say 'Guten Morgen,' and so on, but I can say, 'Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo! That's 'good morning' in chimpanzee.'"
items.content: Jane Goodall Institute France President Pierre Quintard pays tribute to the work and legacy of the legendary primatologist. Jane Goodall transformed the study of chimpanzees and became one of the world's most revered wildlife advocates. In a final video posted before her death, Goodall told an audience: "Some of us could say 'Bonjour,' some of us could say 'Guten Morgen,' and so on, but I can say, 'Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo! That's 'good morning' in chimpanzee.'"

items.content: Jane Goodall, primatologist who transformed our understanding of the lives of apes, has died, according to an announcement from the Jane Goodall Institute. (Image credit: Bertrand Guay)

items.title: Jane Goodall, pioneering primatologist, conservationist and activist, dies at 91
items.standfirst: Jane Goodall, the pioneering primatologist, conservationist and activist who became the world‚Äôs leading expert on chimpanzees, died on Wednesday at the age of 91, the Jane Goodall Institute said in a social media post. Born in London on April 3, 1934, Goodall produced a groundbreaking field study on chimpanzees in the wild in the 1960s and dedicated the latter part of her life to protecting their habitats.
items.content: Jane Goodall, the pioneering primatologist, conservationist and activist who became the world‚Äôs leading expert on chimpanzees, died on Wednesday at the age of 91, the Jane Goodall Institute said in a social media post. Born in London on April 3, 1934, Goodall produced a groundbreaking field study on chimpanzees in the wild in the 1960s and dedicated the latter part of her life to protecting their habitats.

items.title: Jane Goodall, renowned chimpanzee researcher and animal advocate, dies at 91
items.standfirst: Jane Goodall, who documented the behavior and social lives of chimpanzees and later became a leader of the animal conservation movement, died on Wednesday.
items.content: Jane Goodall, who documented the behavior and social lives of chimpanzees and later became a leader of the animal conservation movement, died on Wednesday.

ai_summary: Jane Goodall, a celebrated primatologist and conservationist, passed away at the age of 91 in California.
The Jane Goodall Institute announced her death, citing natural causes during a US speaking tour.
Goodall revolutionized chimpanzee study and became a respected wildlife advocate globally.
Friends and colleagues remember her as an inspiration and a tireless advocate for the natural world.
She challenged how humans relate to the natural world, leaving a lasting legacy.

The court declined to immediately remove Cook, deferring action on the Trump administration's request.
Oral arguments regarding Cook's removal will be heard by the court in January.
The court's decision allows Cook to stay in her position until the arguments are heard.
The case involves a challenge to the president's authority to remove a Fed governor.

items.title: OpenAI‚Äôs New Sora App Lets You Deepfake Yourself for Entertainment
items.standfirst: On Tuesday, OpenAI released an AI video app called Sora. The platform is powered by OpenAI‚Äôs latest video generation model, Sora 2, and revolves around a TikTok-like For You page of user-generated clips. This is the first product release from OpenAI that adds AI-generated sounds to videos. For‚Ä¶
items.content: On Tuesday, OpenAI released an AI video app called Sora. The platform is powered by OpenAI‚Äôs latest video generation model, Sora 2, and revolves around a TikTok-like For You page of user-generated clips. This is the first product release from OpenAI that adds AI-generated sounds to videos. For‚Ä¶

items.title: OpenAI‚Äôs Sora 2 lets users insert themselves into AI videos with sound
items.standfirst: Sora social app launches with deepfake-style "cameos" and feed controls.
items.content: On Tuesday, OpenAI announced Sora 2, its second-generation video-synthesis AI model that can now generate videos in various styles with synchronized dialogue and sound effects, which is a first for the company. OpenAI also launched a new iOS social app that allows users to insert themselves into AI-generated videos through what OpenAI calls "cameos." OpenAI showcased the new model in an AI-generated video that features a photorealistic version of OpenAI CEO Sam Altman talking to the camera in a slightly unnatural-sounding voice amid fantastical backdrops, like a competitive ride-on duck race and a glowing mushroom garden. Regarding that voice, the new model can create what OpenAI calls "sophisticated background soundscapes, speech, and sound effects with a high degree of realism." In May, Google's Veo 3 became the first video-synthesis model from a major AI lab to generate synchronized audio as well as video. Just a few days ago, Alibaba released Wan 2.5, an open-weights video model that can generate audio as well. Now OpenAI has joined the audio party with Sora 2.Read full article Comments

items.title: OpenAI‚Äôs New Sora App Lets You Deepfake Yourself for Entertainment
items.standfirst: OpenAI‚Äôs latest app encourages users to generate a personal digital avatar and scroll AI-generated videos of themselves and their friends.
items.content: OpenAI‚Äôs latest app encourages users to generate a personal digital avatar and scroll AI-generated videos of themselves and their friends.

ai_summary: OpenAI released Sora, an AI video app, powered by the Sora 2 video generation model.
The app features a TikTok-like "For You" page of user-generated video clips.
Sora is the first OpenAI product to add AI-generated sounds to videos.
Users can insert themselves into AI videos using a deepfake-style "cameo" feature.
The app encourages users to create a digital avatar and scroll AI-generated videos.

items.content: A vote to end a US government shutdown failed Wednesday, as Democrats in the Senate held firm to the party‚Äôs demands to fund health care subsidies that President Donald Trump and Republicans refuse to provide.

ai_summary: A government shutdown began due to a funding impasse between Republicans and Democrats.
The shutdown is the first in nearly seven years, impacting government operations.
The impasse involves disagreements over the 2025 funding plan.
The Senate rejected a bid to end the shutdown, with Democrats holding firm.
Democrats are demanding funding for healthcare subsidies, which Republicans oppose.

items.standfirst: Military court convicts Kabila of war crimes, treason and other offences in verdict that could fuel enduring tensionsA military court in the Democratic Republic of the Congo has sentenced the country‚Äôs former president Joseph Kabila to death in absentia after convicting him of war crimes, treason and crimes against humanity.The case stems from his alleged role in backing the advance of M23 rebels supported by Rwanda in DRC‚Äôs volatile eastern provinces.
